Package seng202.team4.model

Class Calculations

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team4.model.Calculations
  • public class Calculations
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs calculations for the emissions tab of the application. Responsible for calculating the distance and carbon emissions of a route.

    • Field Detail

      • AVG_PASSENGER_C02_EMITTED_KM

        private static final double AVG_PASSENGER_C02_EMITTED_KM
        Constant for the figure used as the Average Carbon emitted per passenger per kilometre on a flight. This baseline figure assumes the passenger is on a 65% capacity Boeing 737 with a fuel use of 36.6g per passenger km.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EARTH_RADIUS_KM

        private static final double EARTH_RADIUS_KM
        Constant for the radius of the earth in KM
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • C02_COST_TO_OFFSET_PER_KG

        private static final double C02_COST_TO_OFFSET_PER_KG
        Constant for the cost to offset 1km of flying per passenger. Assumes an offset payment of $14.79 NZD per tonne of C02
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Calculations

        public Calculations()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateEmissions

        public static double calculateEmissions​(Route route)
        Calculates the estimated carbon footprint of a passenger on the provided route. This assumes each plane is a Boeing 737 at 65% capacity Hence it is assumed 0.115kg of C02 is emitted per passenger per kilometre. In the next release the fuel efficiency for different aircraft types will be taken into account
        Parameters:
        route - Route to calculate carbon emissions for
        Returns:
        double the calculated emissions figure for a single passenger

      • calculateDistance

        public static double calculateDistance​(java.lang.String airportCodeOne,
                                       java.lang.String airportCodeTwo,
                                       java.sql.Statement stmt)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the distance between two airports, a departure airport with airportCodeOne and a destination airport with airportCodeTwo. Gets each airports coordinates from the Airport database table and uses the Haversine formula to calculate the distance between these coordinates
        Parameters:
        airportCodeOne - String representing code of the departure airport
        airportCodeTwo - String representing code of the destination airport
        stmt - The given statement
        Returns:
        double the calculated distance between two given airports
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception

      • calculateDollarOffset

        public static double calculateDollarOffset​(Route route)
        Calculates the amount of money required to offset the amount of carbon emissions from the selected route.
        Parameters:
        route - the route to calculate the equivalent dollar donations from
        Returns:
        the dollar donations required to offset flight carbon emissions

      • calculateTreesEquivalent

        public static int calculateTreesEquivalent​(Route route)
        Calculates the equivalent number of trees required to offset the flight carbon emission of the selected route.
        Parameters:
        route - the route to calculate the equivalent trees required from
        Returns:
        the number of trees to offset flight carbon emissions
